message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product. I'm looking to get $115 for it.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  How about $112?  I'm willing to be flexible to make this work for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $109. Can you meet me at that price?
